segments.text: All I can think about is how strange it is that the woman doesn't seem to notice the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water glistens and flows like it’s trying to escape, unbothered by the chaos of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a creeping sense of dread as I watch the boy inch closer to the edge of that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His focus is entirely on the cookie jar, and it makes me laugh a little, even amidst my concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the girl, perfectly poised with her hand reaching upwards, like she's waiting for permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious the woman is; her serenity against this ticking time bomb of a kitchen is astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice it all before it bursts into a wave of chaos, or if today will just be a lesson learned the hard way.
segments.speaker: PAR
